volunteer_experience.info: - Elected and responsible for voicing and addressing various academic issues of more than 100 students to the department faculty.- Kept a check on the initiatives carried out by the DTU-SA and bridging the gap between students and administration.- Handled queries pertaining to the mode of education, arising amidst the COVID-19 pandemic to keep up morale and ensure maximum productivity.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Delhi College of Engineering

volunteer_experience.info: - Worked for the annual cultural festival of college and managed to get a record footfall of over 1,00,000 people.- Led the team of 250+ volunteers to look after the hospitality of over 5000 participants, reputed judges, and performers from various embassies and high commissions during the fest.

volunteer_experience.title: Senior Hospitality Coordinator

projects.title: Hashtag
projects.description: - A full-stack web application to give more details towards a Twitter hashtag to a user- Developed and built the backend of the application with a clone over Twitter UI using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB,Socket.IO for Codechella - Twitter Global Hackathon 2020- Programmed a system to capture hashtags using Twitter API and get meaningful insight for a Twitter hashtag- Devised a hashtag engage platform and implemented the most complex feature using Socket.IO for real-timecommunication across the globe, explaining or discussing the meaning of a hashtag- Deployed it on three separate platforms in a decoupled format (Heroku, Netlify, MongoDB Atlas)

projects.title: Codeial - Social Media Web Application
projects.description: - Developed a social media web application using Node.js serving with Express.js for backend, MongoDB for the database and HTML, CSS for the frontend- Implemented Google OAuth for a better user-experience using Passport.js - Implemented features like notification mails, chatting, posting, liking, commenting on posts, news-feed and other basic features like signing in, forgot password, etc.- Used AJAX and Redis for asynchronous tasks

projects.title: TODO List App
projects.description: - Developed a full-stack web application using Express.js serving with Node.js as the backend.- Integrated EJS, to template HTML and adopted MongoDB for the database.

projects.title: Myntra MORE
projects.description: - Devised a platform to incorporate trends into fashion relevant flows like designing and merchandising, and to detect trends from various happenings and sources across India, to solve Trendiness problem of Myntra Hackathon

projects.title: Music Player
projects.description: - Designed the complete static front-end UI using HTML and CSS.
